short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GroupDoorman extracts members' answers from your Facebook group and pushes to Google Sheets and 30+ email marketing platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GroupDoorman is your best friend for managing your Facebook group membership as smooth as possible. It is a top-notch Chrome extension that makes your life easier by handling all those time-consuming tasks. Now, you can forget about collecting members' answers, approving requests, or syncing data to Google Spreadsheets manually. GroupDoorman does it all - neatly and automatically.

With GroupDoorman, gathering member responses becomes a piece of cake. This extension allows you to set up the rules for approval. Members could be approved based on how they answer questions, their agreements to group rules, or even their join date on Facebook.

Planning automatic approvals is a breeze with an autorun schedule. Just set it up and let GroupDoorman handle the rest. Moreover, it's directly linked with email autoresponders, so adding new members' emails to your marketing software is fast and easy. This makes talking to your group non-stop and smooth.

To ensure top-notch email delivery, GroupDoorman checks if the email addresses really exist on the mail server. This dodges bounce-back emails and keeps your sender reputation shining.

Key features of GroupDoorman Chrome extension:

- Collect members' responses with or without approval
- Google Spreadsheets integration for easy data management
- Customizable approval criteria for efficient member management
- Automated approval with autorun scheduling
- Direct email autoresponder integrations for seamless communication (More than 30 autoresponders are supported such as MailChimp, ActiveCampaign, Klaviyo and etc)
- Email address verification to maintain high deliverability rates

Manage your Facebook group more efficiently and save time with GroupDoorman. Try it today and see the difference!

Changelog:


[1.3.5] 2024-11-05
- Increased timeout during approval process

[1.3.4] 2024-05-30
- Avoid tabs re-usage for better stability
- Added more documentation links

[1.3.3] 2024-05-05
- Support recent FB layout changes in the group questions
- Added the integrations documentation link

[1.3.2] 2024-05-01
- Avoid tasks collisions.

[1.3.1] 2024-02-02
- Fixed collecting group members.

[1.3.0] 2023-05-04
- Added direct integrations with autoresponders: MailerLite, Hubspot, Sendinblue, Klaviyo, Keap (InfusionSoft), Moosend, Sendpulse, Benchmark Email, Omnisend, Sender, Drip, EmailOctopus, VerticalResponse, Constant Contact.

[1.2.0] 2023-03-19
- Added direct integrations with autoresponders: Convert Kit, SendGrid, ActiveCampaign, MailChimp GetResponse, SendLane, GoHighLevel, Kartra.
- Fixed getting groups more than 30 groups you manage.
- determine if FB language is not English.
- upgraded extension to manifest v3.

[1.1.12] 2023-01-22
- Fixed detection of fb loaded page

[1.1.11] 2022-11-10
- Fixed getting groups that you manage.

[1.1.10] 2022-10-16
- Fixed collecting group members.

[1.1.9] 2022-10-13
- Fixed getting groups that you manage.

[1.1.8] 2022-04-11
- Fixed duplicated records in google sheets
- Fixed regressions caused by FB layout changes: approving only one by one and picking up the wrong email and answers

[1.1.7] 2022-04-08
- Re-implemented the algorithm for getting groups that you manage.

[1.1.6] 2022-03-09
- Added OrderBy criteria
- Added timeout to wait for the members container

[1.1.5] 2022-02-02
- Check if isFbRootRendered on page load

[1.1.4] 2022-01-21
- Fixed members approval according to the new Facebook layout changes
- Use the right user index when making copy of google spreadsheet

[1.1.3] 2021-12-30
- Support changed criteria for public groups
- Fixed get groups you manage

[1.1.2] 2021-11-17
- Added Questionnaire On First Post / Comment support for public groups
- Display group name as a link in manage group

[1.1.1] 2021-09-23
- Adjusted according to the new Facebook layout changes
- Added reset password link

[1.1.0] 2021-09-06
- Added Ontraport integration
- It now verifies that the email address is not only valid but really exists before sending to an autoresponder

[1.0.19] 2021-08-27
- Added new Facebook UI support
- Show the progress widget without delay
- Optimized icon for Dark mode or Dark theme

[1.0.18] 2021-08-15
- Fixed issue when approving members (unable to get get scrolling container error)

[1.0.17] 2021-08-09
- Fixed regression when obtaining answers
- Use make a copy URL for spreadsheet
- Improved first run page
- Load member requests from API

[1.0.16] 2021-08-08
- Fixed regression when approving members (unable to get get scrolling container error)

[1.0.15] 2021-07-15
- Fixed an error when getting groups you manage

[1.0.14] 2021-05-31
- Fixed a bug when getting groups on the first launch

[1.0.13] 2021-05-29
- Added support of private profiles

[1.0.12] 2021-05-26
- Fixed regressions caused by FB layout changes
- Added 10 filter criteria: Request Age, Gender, Join Facebook Date, Agreed to the rules, Has profile picture, Profile Type and other.
- Added batch limit which defines how many requests to process per run.

[1.0.11] 2021-04-23
- Fixed regressions caused by FB layout changes
- Integrated Matomo
